item.title: Whole Foods organic carrots and celery recalled amid E. coli outbreak
item.description: Whole Foods Market stores in five states sold recalled carrots and celery sticks that could contain E. coli.

item.title: Judge postpones Trump's New York "hush money" sentencing
item.description: Trump's sentencing in the "hush money" case has been delayed by a New York judge.
